workflow: Login and add first product to cart

trace.thought: The goal is to login and add the first product to the cart. I am currently on the login page. I need to fill in the username and password fields and click the login button. According to the knowledge bank, there are proven locators for the username, password, and login button. I will use these locators to fill in the username and password fields and click the login button.
The goal is to login and add the first product to the cart. The first step is to login. I have already filled the username field. Now I need to fill the password field.

I am on the login page and have filled the username and password fields. The next step is to click the login button to proceed to the inventory page. I will use the proven locator from the knowledge bank for the login button.

The goal is to add the first product to the cart. I am currently on the inventory page, which displays the products. I need to click the 'Add to cart' button for the first product. According to the knowledge bank, the locator for the 'Add to cart' button for the Sauce Labs Backpack is '[data-test="add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack"]'.

The goal is to add the first product to the cart. The history shows that I have already added one product to the cart. Now I need to add another product to the cart. I will click the 'Add to cart' button for the second product.
